document:
Nationalist MPs will take control of the UK Parliament's energy and climate change select committee and Scottish affairs select committee.
The SNP won 56 of the 59 Westminster constituencies at the general election two weeks ago.
That resulted in the party being the third largest, behind the Conservatives and Labour.
Parliamentary convention dictates that the official third largest party at Westminster gets to chair a number of select committees.
SNP chief whip Mike Weir said both committees were especially important to Scotland in this parliament.
He said: "We will be seeing one of the major bills coming forward in the Scotland Bill on more powers for Scotland, and of course the energy and climate change committee is of particular importance with our oil and gas sector and renewables industry.
"The SNP chairing these committees will allow us to make progress on these important issues, and will help us get the best deal for Scotland."
claim: a holyrood committee is to set up a committee to give mps more powers to the scottish parliament.
doc_sents: Nationalist MPs will take control of the UK Parliament's energy and climate change select committee and Scottish affairs select committee.
The SNP won 56 of the 59 Westminster constituencies at the general election two weeks ago.
That resulted in the party being the third largest, behind the Conservatives and Labour.
Parliamentary convention dictates that the official third largest party at Westminster gets to chair a number of select committees.
SNP chief whip Mike Weir said both committees were especially important to Scotland in this parliament.

He said: "We will be seeing one of the major bills coming forward in the Scotland Bill on more powers for Scotland, and of course the energy and climate change committee is of particular importance with our oil and gas sector and renewables industry.
"The SNP chairing these committees will allow us to make progress on these important issues, and will help us get the best deal for Scotland."
sum_sents: a holyrood committee is to set up a committee to give mps more powers to the scottish parliament.
extra:
[
  "a holyrood committee is to set up a committee to give mps more powers",
  "a holyrood committee is to set up a committee to give mps more powers to the scottish parliament"
]
cot:
1. The summary statements are all supported by the article.
Therefore, the answer is yes, the summary is consistent with the article.
human_reason:
1. The summary mentions a holyrood committe and giving MPs more powers to the scottish parliament
2. The article does not mention anything about a Holyrood committee or giving MPs more powers to the Scottish Parliament.
3. The article states that the SNP will take control of the UK Parliament's energy and climate change select committee and Scottish affairs select committee.
Therefore, the answer is no, the summary is not consistent with the article.
gpt-3.5-turbo-0301:
1. The article mentions that the SNP (Scottish National Party) will take control of two select committees in the UK Parliament - the energy and climate change select committee and Scottish affairs select committee.
2. The SNP won 56 out of 59 Westminster constituencies in the recent general election, making them the third largest party in Parliament.
3. Parliamentary convention dictates that the official third largest party gets to chair a number of select committees.
4. The SNP chief whip, Mike Weir, stated that both committees are important to Scotland in this parliament, particularly with regards to the Scotland Bill and the energy and climate change sector.
5. The SNP chairing these committees will allow them to make progress on these important issues and get the best deal for Scotland.

The summary is not consistent with the article. The article discusses the SNP taking control of two select committees in the UK Parliament, while the summary mentions a holyrood committee setting up a committee to give MPs more powers to the Scottish Parliament, which is not mentioned in the article.
